original_text: As for Melchizedek, he did not come from Levi's family. But he still received a tenth part of what Abraham had. He also asked God to bless Abraham. But Abraham was the one who had already received God's promises.
korean_text: 레위 족보에 들지 아니한 멜기세덱은 아브라함에게서 십분의 일을 취하고 약속을 받은 그를 위하여 복을 빌었나니

sentences.original_text: he did not come from Levi's family
But he still received a tenth part
He also asked God to bless Abraham
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 또한 하나님께 아브라함을 축복해달라고 요청했습니다

sentences.original_text: who had already received God's promises
